data.name: We Will Part
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Two young strangers are thrown together at a country cottage at a moment both have put their lives on pause. A fledgling bond develops over their few days. Curiosity leads to Infatuation. Joy replaces anguish. Acting on impulse triggered by the fear of losing rediscovered life, Zoe blatantly seduces Taylor. Long lost passions awaken. Realizing involvement would bring heartbreak; Zoe turns on Taylor. Their keen values of time return to kill their joy, Unaware that he needs time to heal after losing his parents in an accident, Zoe demeans his choices and accuses him of wasting his life. Unaware that she has a deadly illness, he is confused and hurt. Zoe reveals that she is out of time and disappears overnight, forcing a devastated Taylor to leave - to find a new beginning, back to life.

data.short_description: A film about a young man, a woman, and the few days they are forced to spend together in a remote cabin in Sweden.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
